Detailed Description

Interface of APS Transport-Key Services.

Definition in file apsmeTransportKey.h.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum APS_TransportKeyType_t

KeyType Parameter of the Transport-Key Primitive. See ZigBee Specification r19, Table 4.12, page 452.

The APS-layer provides this services that allow an initiator to transport keying material to a responder. The different types of keying material that can be transported are shown in Tables 4.12 to 4.15 of ZigBee Spec. r19.

Enumerator:
APS_TRUST_CENTER_MASTER_KEY_TYPE 

Indicates the key is a master key used to set up link keys between the Trust Center and another device.

APS_STANDARD_NETWORK_KEY_TYPE 

Indicates that the key is a network key to be used in standard security mode and may be distributed using key-transport or a standard network key.

APS_APP_MASTER_KEY_TYPE 

Indicates the key is a master key used to set up link keys between two devices.

APS_APP_LINK_KEY_TYPE 

Indicates the key is a link key used as a basis of security between two devices.

APS_TRUST_CENTER_LINK_KEY_TYPE 

Indicates that the key is a link key used as a basis for security between the Trust Center and another device.

APS_HIGH_SECURITY_NETWORK_KEY_TYPE 

Indicates that the key is a network key to be used in high security mode and may be distributed using key-transport only.

Definition at line 43 of file apsmeTransportKey.h.

enum APS_TkrStatus_t
